BBEX3.M.CDF.EUR.CA.AC.A01: Exchange rates for the euro in the Democratic Republic of the Congo * / EUR 1 = CDF ... (middle)
General: *Referred to as indicative rates until December 2008.

Source: Since January 2009 calculated on the basis of buying and selling rates of the Banque Centrale du Congo, Kinshasa. September 2006 - December 2008 Fortis Bank, Brüssel January 1999 - August 2006 Banque Belgolaise, Brüssel

Comment on 1999-04: On 6 April 1999, the Congo franc was devalued. We recorded the following exchange rates:  5 April 1999: EUR 1 = CDF 3.16835  6 April 1999: EUR 1 = CDF 4.94665  Calculated devaluation: 35.9%.

Comment on 2000-01: On 22 January 2000, the Congo franc was devalued. We recorded the following exchange rates:  21 January 2000: EUR 1 = CDF 4.7048  24 January 2000: EUR 1 = CDF 9.2005  Calculated devaluation: 48.9%.

Comment on 2000-06: On 10 June 2000, the Congo franc was devalued. We recorded the following exchange rates:  9 June 2000: EUR 1 = CDF 8.79145  12 June 2000: EUR 1 = CDF 22.8783  Calculated devaluation: 61.6%.

Comment on 2000-10: On 24 October 2000, the Congo franc was devalued. We recorded the following exchange rates:  23 October 2000: EUR 1 = CDF 20.24  24 October 2000: EUR 1 = CDF 43.34  Calculated devaluation: 53.3%.

Comment on 2001-05: On 28 May 2001, the Congo franc was devalued. We recorded the following exchange rates:  25 May 2001: EUR 1 = CDF 44.03  28 May 2001: EUR 1 = CDF 266.75  Calculated devaluation: 83.5%.
Comment on 2009-08: Exchange rate as of 7 September 2009.
